messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Peaceful Parenting & Thinking Sticks!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/03 4:53:37 AM, mabeitzel@yahoo.com writes:  Richard Prystowsky and I did a joint
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/03 4:53:37 AM, mabeitzel@... writes:

<< May I ask what the Peaceful parenting tape is? >>

Richard Prystowsky and I did a joint presentation at the HSC conference in
Sacramento last fall, called Peaceful Parenting. I have cassette tapes for
$7 or $6 in person at the August conference in South Carolina.

We have another joint presentation on tape called "To Question or Not to
Question: That is the Question," about how crucial a family's attitude toward
questions is to unschooling.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: Peaceful Parenting & Thinking Sticks!
messages.msgSnippet: May I ask what the Peaceful parenting tape is? Michelle B. ... the ... wonderful!
messages.messageBody:
May I ask what the Peaceful parenting tape is?
Michelle B.

messages.subject: Peaceful Parenting & Thinking Sticks!
messages.msgSnippet: Incase you didn t get my e-mail Sandra, thank-you very much for the peaceful parenting tape and the thinking sticks. They are wonderful! ~Kim
messages.messageBody:
Incase you didn't get my e-mail Sandra, thank-you very much for the
peaceful parenting tape and the thinking sticks. They are wonderful!

~Kim
